name: ColorGenerator
0:
”Alexa, ask Color Generator to give me a random color.”
”Alexa, ask Color Generator to pick any warm color.”
”Alexa, ask Color Generator to tell me any non-neutral color.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color generator
des:
This skill will return a color to you based upon criteria given.
If asked for a color, Alexa will return any random color from the list of all supported HTML colors.
You may also ask for Warm, Cool, or Neutral colors for colors that will fit those categories.
You can also ask for non-warm, non-cool, or non-neutral colors to get any color from the list excluding the type requested.

Great for getting HTML compatible colors for web design, or for any other usage where you may need a color name!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
